citation: Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 12(1) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 declare â€“

        (a) the land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of private nature reserve and give the name Blindburn Creek Private Nature Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (b) the land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of private nature reserve and give the name Mountain Valley Private Nature Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (c) the land specified in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of private nature reserve and give the name Little Swanport Private Nature Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (d) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which it is registered in accordance with section 22 of that Act.
7 March 2005

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Environment and Planning

SCHEDULE 1 - Private Nature Reserves

PART 1 - Blindburn Creek Private Nature Reserve

All that area of land comprising about 38.083 hectares and shown as Area 1 and Area 4, shaded and bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 5915 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 2 - Mountain Valley Private Nature Reserve

All that area of land comprising about 51.143 hectares and shown as Area 1 to Area 6 inclusive, shaded and bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 5896 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 3 - Little Swanport Private Nature Reserve

All that area of land comprising about 299.39 hectares and shown as Lot 1 to Lot 3 inclusive, shaded and bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 5795 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plans

PART 1 - Blindburn Creek Private Nature Reserve

PART 2 - Mountain Valley Private Nature Reserve

PART 3 - Little Swanport Private Nature Reserve

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 March 2005

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
